name: Jilly the Jelly
description:
Meet Jilly the Jelly!

Jilly is just a simple jellyfish trying to make her way in the dangerous underwater world.  Will she be eaten? Will she find  her girlfriend Crabantha? It's up to you to explore!

Jilly the Jelly is a 2D swimming platformer made with 100% hand-painted  watercolor assets and backgrounds. 

Game design and art: Laura Rowe (Lorca Creates)

Music: Forgottenland by airtone

Created with Unity

This is my first game, so any comments or critique are welcome!
